greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Product_{h|n and h mod 6 = 1} h; product of divisors of n of the form 6*k + 1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10001
program: (PARI) A140213(n) = { my(m=1); fordiv(n, d, if(1==(d%6), m *= d)); (m); }; \\ _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 09 2017
results.author: _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 27 2008
ext: More terms from _D. S. McNeil_, Mar 24 2009
